name: Notion Project Management Compass
description: Streamline your small business workflows with the Notion Project Management Compass.The Notion Project Management Compass is the Template for freelancers, founders, and small businesses. Get organized and improve efficiency with this Notion project management template. Manage everything from team tasks to customer relationships in one place.It highlights Notion's strengths as a project and task management tool by allowing you to:Quickly create new tasksEasily prioritize tasks to guarantee high R
features: Quickly create new tasks; Easily prioritize tasks to guarantee high ROI work; Effortlessly assign tasks to team members and projects; Asynchronously communicate with your international team; Single Page Template - For easy navigation; Eisenhower Matrix - For effortless prioritizing; Forum - For efficient asynchronous communication; Daily Task Manager - For quickly assigning new tasks; Project Views - For focusing on the projects that count; Team Views - For assigning tasks to individual team members
